Joseph Dietrich Monastery Diary

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
dietrich:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Reinhard Priber, tool coordinator and software developer, University of Bern, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of specific concepts in the scientific study "Das Kloster-Tagebuch des Einsiedler Paters Joseph Dietrich, 1670-1704".
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about father Joseph Dietrich's monastery diary
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

dietrich:DiaryEntry
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Diary entry authored by father Joseph Dietrich.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
dietrich:
rdfs:label
Tagebucheintrag des Paters Joseph Dietrich (de)
diary entry by father Joseph Dietrich (en)
rdfs:subClassOf
text:HandwrittenText
text-expression:DiaryEntry
dietrich:DiaryVolume
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Diary volume written and authored by father Joseph Dietrich.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
dietrich:
rdfs:label
diary volume by father Joseph Dietrich (en)
Tagebuch-Band des Paters Joseph Dietrich (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
information-carrier:Diary
information-carrier:Manuscript
information-carrier:Volume
